glsa.title: stunnel: Arbitrary code execution
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability was found in stunnel, allowing remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service and potentially arbitrary code execution.

background.p: The stunnel program is designed to work as an SSL encryption wrapper between a client and a local or remote server.

description.p: An unspecified heap vulnerability was discovered in stunnel.

impact.p: The vulnerability may possibly be leveraged to perform remote code execution or a Denial of Service attack.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All stunnel 4.x users should upgrade to the latest version:
